website_summaries.verdict: Guaranteed to arrive with live probiotic cultures due to controlled temperatures.
pros: Company makes an effort to keep the probiotics fresh and cool with cold pack shipping
Helps bowel problems, makes you more regular and provides relief from constipation
cons: You have to take several pills at a time to get the best results
Since these are not shelf stable, the probiotics can lose effect if they get too hot

customer_reviews.title: Not cold pack shipped
customer_reviews.text: I can not comment on the effectiveness of this product at this time because I just received it yesterday, but what I can comment on is that my product was not cold packed as suggested by the manufacture ie (Ensure your probiotics are shipped with a cold pack) that is a very big concern for me and I'm wondering if this means that my product arrived to me already dead or ineffective which would be a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: IBS
customer_reviews.text: I have been battling IBS for over 5 years now. After having several close calls, I had to try something "Natural". This product definitely works i am 6'4" 245 and two pills in the AM are all it takes to calm down my "bubble guts"... I have found that three bind me up a bit. After not taking them for 3 days, it goes right back to mud butt...
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: They showed up hot to the touch which is unfortunate considering they are supposed to remain cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Meeker

customer_reviews.title: This really works It has helped me alot
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say I have used this product for about a year now and it has really made a difference on my stomach issues and made me more active to go #2. I have not used any other probiotics products but this one works so I will continue to use it. Looking forward to ordering again.got my product it came with a cold pack was not expecting it so they should come alive being that it RAW it can make a difference. Hope that helps make a decision on buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I can get this product on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I can get this product on Amazon. Sometimes they are sold out in Whole Foods. This is the only probiotic that works for me. I have been using it for years now and it does work. I wish it would be less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: fan of photos

customer_reviews.title: Marked effect on gluten intolerance
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive, yes. But unlike other "premium" (read: high priced) probiotics I've tried, these did not cause GI issues, bloating, gas, etc. and they seem to help with digesting gluten, which otherwise causes me serious GI issues. So I am buying again and would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: E. Victor

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Not to be grotesque, but I noticed a change in my stool for the better after I started taking these. I have tried other brands and did not have same outcome, so I would say they're doing something good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pawlicki

customer_reviews.title: Delivered warm
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very good, but the shipping was less than perfect. The cold pack was melted and warm. I would not order this in the summer when heat can ruin the product as cold pack was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product does great things to take care stomach/intestinal issues that bothered me ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does great things to take care stomach/intestinal issues that bothered me for years; I also find I sleep better and have better energy when I'm awake since I began taking these two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rand M. Hubiak

customer_reviews.title: product packaging was defective
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when the bottle showed up yesterday. The box was hot, the cool pack was damaged and hot, and the capsules were also hot. I am not sure if they are even good anymore? I ordered these for my husband because I really like their probiotics for women - but, those showed up in a cold pack and have worked great. Not sure if I can trust ordering them anymore:(
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Helps improve my digestion, love this product. Highly recommend it if you have digestion problems but seek medical advice first before use.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best probiotics I have had. The only downside is the recommended quantity to the number of pills you need to take daily. It feels like I am swallowing rocks after pill three.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived hot
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived very hot and the ice pack was just as hot. Very disappointing since the manufacturer states it cold from manufacture to delivery. Not true in this case. Will try and return since not sure if good or not.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Stephens

customer_reviews.title: my body seems to work better when I take it
customer_reviews.text: I take this supplement all the time, my body seems to work better when I take it, especially when consuming dairy and beans. I get less gassy and digest food better.

I take them regularly, but not necessarily daily, (I try but, it doesn't always work out). I highly recommend these to anyone who is tired of digestion issues and irregularity. These will help! 5 STARS.

He did not understand the live probiotic ingredients were the most important part of the pill. The first order I placd had cold packs the second one didn't. I don't think I ordered any differently. This type of item should ALWAYS come cold packed or give that option.

After eating some normal foods such as chicken I would always feel like blawwww and I would be alittle bloated for an hr or two.. After taking these pills I no longer have that feeling and am not bloated ! Great great product !

This product was also recommended for my husband to take. He started taking it two times a day. However, I have told him to take one more because he still had some symptoms. This product has helped him greatly, too! I definitely recommend it!

I would like to see more capsules in a bottle offering even a greater value. Buying on line is significantly a savings as opposed to buying retail or even at a store discount. customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these re great, but I got them for my grandfather and, at 90 years old, he is a bit cantankerous. I won't even tell you why he said he doesn't like them, lol!

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful Which Company You Buy From
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Couldn't be happier how this has help to quiet my bowels. However, don't ever purchase this from Magic Liquidators, however cheap they sell it for. I just received a bottle from them that expires 11/15. I immediately noticed that the last bottle I purchased from another company two months ago doesn't expire until 1/17! Perhaps Magic Liquidators buys them from other companies at a discount and sells them to unsuspecting consumers. No telling if they have been sitting around for a year or two before they resale them. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Roachman

customer_reviews.title: Made my IBS worse
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me . It made my IBS worse. It did not help my problem what so ever. Made my IBS worse.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Souza

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came cold and in glass jar. Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Came in bag with ice pack and wrapped in insulation, glass jar, solid product. Glad I have the ring doorbell because the incompetent Amazon driver left them practically in my driveway not in my mailbox or front door which is shaded instead they were in hot sun. Either way awesome product and I am a customer for life. I was on antibiotics for a few weeks and my whole digestive system was messed up bad, stomach pains, constipation, just felt oddly sick after medication and weeks after stopping them. Within two days of taking these I felt immediately better. In fact my stomach feels better than it ever has in years . Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Normally a good product, but not if purchased here!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and these probiotics. I normally buy them at a local store, but couldn't pass up saving a few bucks on amazon. That was a mistake! They were guaranteed to arrive cool and fresh, they were extremely hot by the time I received them! I'm sure most the live culture's are no longer alive, making it pointless. Love the brand, but buying at local store from now on. Not wasting money on something that isn't handled properly causing it to be useless for my body.
customer_reviews.author: Allendra Bourget

customer_reviews.title: Keep an eye on the shipping quality...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I have been using consistently for over 2 years and I have turned several friends and family members onto it and it has helped them as well. Serving size is 3, however, I only take 2 daily (6ft, 225lbs). I've experienced the same lapses in shipping quality as many others have reported, so I highly recommend stocking up during the winter months to get you through the summer months; this way at least if they pack it incorrectly you know that it was still in a cold warehouse and then on a cold truck as opposed to the ovens that those places turn into during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: JWS58

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this for my son. Ulcerative Colitis left him malnourished and very ill. The comprehensive formulation provided nearly everything we wanted to help him. I'm convinced that this vitamin blend - and particularly the loads of probiotics and whole food - made all the difference in healing from a devastating flare. So easy too - cut down the number of pills you take - 4 of these have you covered. This product sold me on Garden of Life, leading to further purchases of this and other products they produce.
customer_reviews.author: 2redhot

customer_reviews.title: I can eat cheese again
customer_reviews.text: I am lactose intolerant. I took a pill right before eating a bunch of lasagna and I'm still perfectly fine hours later. I know this probiotic does more than that but that's primarily my interest in it. I only take one or two a day. When I ordered it, it came with an ice pack to keep it cool. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because you are supposed to keep it cool, which is a little hassle. At over $35 a bottle it's also expensive - but if I only take it when I eat dairy then the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Peridot Antlers

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: 185b organisms at the time of manufacture and 85b at the time of expiration. Great product. I personally just take one a day for daily health. I don’t have any major issues I’m combatting. Of course, consult your doctor and pharmacist to see if this is right for you or will interact negatively with prescriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C Blake

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to any aging man....it's liberating!
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my husband immensely with previous digestive difficulties. It took 2-3 weeks and he got relief from his peculiar combination of constipation and diarrhea, which changes from day to day. He is also sitting and sleeping more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrive hot and does not work
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. The pills did nothing at all and arrived hot and apparently dead. Seller did not refrigerate and thus the product does not work at all. My system usually responds quickly to probiotics but due to seller incompetence the bacteria--sold at such a steep price--did not survive shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Burke

customer_reviews.title: ... of research on the internet searching for the absolute best probiotics, I found it with this product
customer_reviews.text: After doing hours of research on the internet searching for the absolute best probiotics, I found it with this product. I believe both children and adults should be taking this product on a regular basis. If we don't maintain good health, what else do we have in this life, and this product is necessary to do that, and it is by far the best out there, If you are looking for a great probiotic, stop searching because this product is the best available in my opinion, and I really did the research. That's what I do.

customer_reviews.text: These have been an amazing probiotic. I would highly recommend them as a daily supplement. I take at least one every morning and there's a noticeable difference throughout my day.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: Garden of Life - RAW Probiotics Men - Acidophilus and Bifidobacteria Probiotic-Created Vitamins, Minerals, Enzymes and Prebiotics - Gluten and Soy-Free, Non-GMO - 90 Vegetarian Capsules (Shipped Cold)
product_meta.description: Garden of Life RAW Probiotics Men is a RAW, full spectrum, whole food probiotic formula specifically designed to meet the unique needs of men. RAW Probiotics Men offers 31 original probiotics, including L.fermentum, specifically formulated for men to support immunity during exercise and physical exertion. RAW Probiotics Men also delivers probiotic-created vitamins, minerals, and prebiotics as well as dairy-digesting enzymes to help break down lactose and casein. RAW Probiotics Men goes Beyond Probiotics offering a broad range of benefits specifically targeted for men. RAW means our probiotics are uncooked, untreated, unadulterated; with no binders or fillers and no carriers such as maltodextrin or dextrose. What you see on the label is what you get in the bottle—temperature-controlled cold storage and delivery from the moment the probiotic cultures are harvested until you swallow your first capsule—ensures that your probiotics Arrive Alive!
feature_bullets: ARRIVE ALIVE GUARANTEE: Your probiotics are stored at 10 degrees F (-12 degrees C) until purchase and are shipped alive with a cold pack to ensure bacterial culture survival. Refrigerate upon arrival.

Digestion Support: This 85 billion CFU probiotic supplement contains Lactobacillus acidophilus, plantarum, and fermentum as well as Bifidobacterium (Bifidobacteria) bifidum, lactis, and longum to support digestive health.
Probiotic For Men: Specially formulated probiotic to support men's specific health needs, prostate health and heart health.
Colon Health Support: Promotes bowel regularity, digestive functions, and healthy nutrient absorption with probiotics to support with constipation and immune system health.

Digestive Enzyme Supplement: Delivers probiotic-created vitamins, minerals, and prebiotics as well as dairy-digesting enzymes to help break down lactose and casein. This probiotic supplement is gluten free, soy free, and vegetarian with no binders, no fillers, no carriers, or soy allergens.
